dcterms:description: IrokoBench is a human-translated benchmark dataset for 16 typologically diverse low-resource African languages covering three tasks: natural language inference (AfriXNLI), mathematical reasoning (AfriMGSM), and multi-choice knowledge-based QA (AfriMMLU).
dcterms:title: IrokoBench

Veselin Stoyanov
dcterms:description: AfriXNLI is a dataset for evaluating cross-lingual sentence representations, focusing on natural language inference tasks.
dcterms:title: AfriXNLI

dcterms:creator: Dan Hendrycks
Collin Burns
Steven Basart

Jacob Steinhardt
dcterms:description: AfriMGSM is a dataset for measuring mathematical reasoning through grade school mathematics problems.
dcterms:title: AfriMGSM

dcterms:creator: Dan Hendrycks
Collin Burns
Saurav Kadavath

Steven Basart

Jacob Steinhardt
dcterms:description: AfriMMLU is a multi-choice knowledge QA dataset curated from freely available online sources covering various subjects.
dcterms:title: AfriMMLU
